# Portfolio & Blog Website

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md exists
- [x] Project Requirements: Portfolio + Blog website with HTML/CSS/JS, responsive design, dark mode, free GitHub Pages hosting
- [x] Scaffold project structure (index.html, css/styles.css, js/script.js, README.md)
- [x] Customize for portfolio/blog features
- [x] Install required extensions (Live Server)
- [x] Verify build/compile (No errors found)
- [x] Create dev server task (Python HTTP server on port 8000)
- [x] Complete documentation

## Project Features

✅ Responsive Design - Mobile, tablet, desktop
✅ Dark Mode Toggle - Theme persistence with localStorage
✅ Portfolio Section - Project showcase with tags
✅ Blog Section - Display blog posts with dates and read time
✅ Contact Section - Social media and email links
✅ Smooth Animations - CSS animations and scroll-triggered effects
✅ Modern Styling - Gradient accents and professional UI

## Quick Start

1. **View locally**: Open Terminal and run "Start Local Server" task (http://localhost:8000)
2. **Customize**: Edit index.html, js/script.js with your content
3. **Deploy**: Follow README.md GitHub Pages deployment steps
4. **Connect domain**: Update DNS settings at your registrar
